articles.title: INS Vikrant, 1st India-Made Aircraft Carrier, Commissioned By PM: 10 Facts
articles.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi today commissioned INS Vikrant, India's first home-built aircraft carrier, in a grand ceremony at Cochin Shipyard. The 45,000-tonne warship has been built at a cost of Rs 20,000 crore.
articles.content: <li>262 metres long and 62 metres wide, INS Vikrant is the largest warship to be built in India. It can have 30 aircraft on board, including MiG-29K fighter jets and helicopters. The warship can acco… [+2010 chars]

articles.title: Noida Twin Towers Land To Be Used For Residential Project: Supertech
articles.description: Supertech Limited stated that the Twin Towers, which were demolished on August 28, belonged to the company and will be used for another residential project after getting the due approval from Noida Authority.
articles.content:
On August 28, Supertech's "illegal" Twin Towers were demolished in Noida after Supreme Court's order.
